name: Dodge The Odds [ALPHA]
description:
Not finished... ALPHA version
NOTE: For MacOS users, it might not work because Apple has a habit of not allowing foreign applications to run without having authorized by it (See Install Instructions on how to, hopefully, play the game on a MacOS).

Controls:

W - Move forward

A - Move left

S - Move down

D - Move left

Left Click / Spacebar - Attack

(Press F11 for fullscreen)

(Prone to bugs, since its ALPHA, will fix if any)
